channel.title: Music – David Sabastian
channel.description: Recent content in David Sabastian on Music

item.title: David Sabastian - Beyoncé's Perfect
item.description:
Yeah Beyonce Perfect
And Rihanna too
Kanye’s a genius
And Drake’s so cool
All the Kardashian’s China and Caitlyn too
I want to be famous(gonna be famous)
Just like you

I just wanna be rich
In a big ole house
At the top of the hill
Somewhere in the mountains
How does it feel to be rich?
And everybody wanna take a pic
Can’t go out in public you sick
But you know that everyone tryna take a flick
Cause you pose
And make sure you get my good side
yeah yeah yeah
Make sure you get my good side yeah yeah
No wonder why girls don’t wanna eat
They had to go and cry themselves to sleep
Cause every time they turn on the tv
Every time they turn on the tv
They wanna be like

Beyonce
Cause she’s perfect
And Rihanna too
Kanye a genius
And Drake’s so cool yeah
All the Kardashians China and Caitlyn too
I want to be famous just like you
Yeah yeah yeah

I just wanna be famous
At the top of the A-list
Everybody wanna know who you are
and who you came with
And you’re only as famous as the person
that you’re fucking
And you’re only as big as your last hit
But you ain’t shit now cause that was last year
You can’t remember
who you were before you got here
And you don’t wanna be alive if you’re not here
Who’d you sell your soul to?
And who controls you?
And does the elevator own you?
And when it’s all over whatcha gonna do?
Just look at Michael and Prince damn
They kill my niggas over publishing
Either the label or was it the government?
Cause we all dolla signs dolla signs

I wanna get buff like Drake
But I’m too lazy to lose weight
It’s easy to get fit when you’re rich
If I was rich I’d be mother fuckin ripped
When you broke you eat like shit
My diet consists of Arizona and chips
You wanna look like Kim?
How much you wanna spend?

Glow up Cali Glow up
If your butt get any bigger
you might just blow up
Said she wanna be famous she wanna blow up
Watch her whole Instagram followers
go up go up
My little niece wanna marry prince charming
Buy a unicorn and a fucking Audi
Whatcha wanna be when you grow up grow up?
She said she wanna be Beyonce

Cause Beyonce
She’s perfect
And Rihanna too
Kanye a genius
And Drake’s so cool yeah
All the Kardashian’s China and Caitlyn too
I want to be famous just like you
I just wanna be rich
